name: Blessed Surface
description: An open-world 2d platformer, Blessed Surface uses the side-scrolling perspective to create a deep, greatly vertical space with no sky, only endless passages upwards. A functioning ecosystem, equipment customization, dynamic encounters and more form a rich, living world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Made in Gamemaker Studio 2
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
